title: RPG Spoken Words Pack 1
description: Versatile RPG vocal SFX pack for immersive game audio - Total 2338
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


The pack includes following spoken words arranged Alphabetically:- 

Activate, Add, Answer, Ascend, Back, Battery low, Call, Cancel, Catastrophe, Chat, Check, Click, Close, Collapse, Comment, Confirm, Confirmed, Connect, Create, Deactivate, Delete, Descend, Deselect, Details, Disable, Disconnect, Dislike, Don’t look back, Don’t stop, Download, Edit, Enable, Error, Expand, Failed, Fast Forward, Favorite, Filter, Forward, Game menu, Game settings, Glitch, Go straight, Goodbye, Hang up, Help, Hide, Home, Info, Jump, Keep running, Launch, Like, Lock, Low charge, Low fuel, Maximize, Message, Minimize, More, Mute, Next, No, Notification, Okay, Open, Options, Pair, Pause, Pin, Points for you, Power off, Power on, Previous, Rate, Receive, Record, Refresh, Remove, Replay, Resume, Review, Rewind, Save, Scroll, Search, Select, Send, Share, Show, Skip, Slow Motion, Sort, Start, Stop, Success, Summary, Swipe, System hanged, Tag, Take it easy, Take left, Take right, Take a U Turn, Tap, Toggle, Uncheck, Unmute, Unlock, Unpair, Unpin, Upload, Volume down, Volume up, Warning, Welcome


ALSO CHECK FOR A SIMILAR PACK HERE


Description;

With a total of 2338 Spoken words SFX, elevate your game’s audio landscape with RPG_Spoken-Words_Pack1, a comprehensive collection of high-quality vocal sound effects tailored for video game developers. This pack features a diverse array of spoken words, delivered in clear and crisp audio recordings that cover a wide range of expressions and commands commonly used in RPGs.


From essential gameplay commands to character interactions, this pack has it all. The included words are voiced in multiple versions - male, female, kids, and robotic tones - providing a versatile toolkit for any gaming scenario.


Whether you’re creating an epic fantasy adventure or a futuristic sci-fi quest, the RPG_Spoken-Words_Pack1 will help you bring characters and environments to life with authentic and engaging sound design. Each word is meticulously recorded and edited to ensure seamless integration into your game’s audio system.


The pack is organized for easy navigation, with each word labeled and sorted to speed up your workflow. With RPG_Spoken-Words_Pack1, you’re not just enhancing the gaming experience; you’re crafting an immersive world that players can truly feel a part of.

Product photo is CreatedWithAI
technicalDetails:
Features: 

Male SFX

Female SFX

Kid SFX

Robotic SFX


Number of Audio Waves: 2338

Number of Audio Cues: 2338

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 46:26

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
